titles.title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on methyl and ethyl parathion.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 11/20/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend the duty on o,o-Diethyl-o-(4-nitrophenyl)-phosphorothioate and o-o-Dimethyl-o-(4-nitrophenyl)-phosphorothioate through December 31, 1992.
